caption: Ok @beaub I know this isn't a creative post at all but it seriously means so much to me. I don't think you realise how much of an impact you've actually had on my life... You have lifted me out of my darkest days and put a smile on my face. I know so many people say this but you are honestly the reason I am alive today. This picture explains how I felt when we finally met. I was so so so thankful, I was so so glad I didn't end my life during my hardest times- I was FINALLY with the person who saved me, I finally was able to touch you and talk to you in real life and not behind a screen. I just really want you to know what you really have done for me.... I don't care about the $50 or the shoutout, I just care about you seeing this and realising how important you are; Happy Valentines from Ireland. I love you with all my heart, thank you so much ? #BeausValentine x
